critique: This document is an executive order regarding the payment of transportation expenses for government employees and their families when transferred for permanent duty. It references specific legislation (Independent Offices Appropriation Act of 1946 and 1947) and a previous executive order (No. 9587). It appears to be an administrative matter with little to no direct impact on ideological tilt, immigration, executive power, federalism, national security vs. civil liberties, economic regulation, or social inclusion. Therefore, most scores should be neutral.
